mapper.insert: insert into hbq_agent_app(name, a_desc, tags, reg_time) values (#{name}, #{desc}, #{tags}, #{reg_time})

insert into hbq_agent_instance(data_center, ip, host_name, port, process_no, tags, reg_time, app_name) values (#{data_center}, #{ip}, #{host_name}, #{port}, #{process_no}, #{tags}, #{reg_time}, #{app_name})

insert into hbq_agent_quota(data_center, app_name, ip, port, quota_name, quota_desc, quota_unit, quota_type, cycle_time, cycle_unit) values (#{data_center}, #{app_name}, #{ip}, #{port}, #{quota_name}, #{quota_desc}, #{quota_unit}, #{quota_type}, #{cycle_time}, #{cycle_unit})
